detaileddescription.para:
This repository is my implementation of the Hack computer in C++ from the NAnd2Tetris course.
I wanted to explore a more in-depth perspective, so it does not strictly adhere to the course. Plus I wanted something self-contained in the end. In order to do that, the supplied tools in the course materials were written from scratch.
It uses CMake for its build system.

listitem.para: Utils Implements general functionality that is used project wide.
Chips Implements the circuit class library.
Assembler Implements the machine code compiler.
Virtual Machine Implements the virtual machine compiler.
Compiler Implements the compiler for the .jack format.
Bindings Provides a script language interface.
Computer Defines the main program that ties the components together.
Extra Tools Optional tools that are not part of the source.
